meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed picking whortles in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I found some delicious whortles growing by the stream.
meanings.sent3: Grandma made a tasty pie using the whortles we gathered.
meanings.sent4: The whortles in the basket looked like colorful jewels.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the whortles filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: We will whortles from the bushes for our dessert.
meanings.sent2: She carefully whortles the ripe berries into her basket.
meanings.sent3: The kids raced to see who could whortles the most whortles.
meanings.sent4: He whortles with such speed that the basket fills in no time.
meanings.sent5: In the morning, we will whortles fresh whortles for breakfast.

meanings.sent1: Her favorite part of summer is the whortles she eats.
meanings.sent2: The whortles disappeared quickly as everyone enjoyed them.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to have a whortles-eating contest with his friends.
meanings.sent4: The joy on her face while eating the whortles was priceless.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her whortles echoed through the quiet room.
